titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL933_03
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL933_03

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.[...] of ʿInānān Dhū-Dharaʾān set up the stele of 2.the aid of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʾĪlmuquh Lord of the Ib- 3.their [we]ll-being and the well-being of their children and their property.
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Biʿathtar, and his sons, of the line]age of ʿInānān Dhū-Dharaʾān set up the stele [of] 2.[their goddess of protection with the favorable oracle and] the aid of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʾĪlmuquh Lord of the Ib- 3.[exes, and Shamsum (i.e the goddess of protection), for] their [we]ll-being and the well-being of their children and their property.

Text preserved in this squeeze:
... of ʿInānān Dhū-Dharaʾān set up the stele of
the aid of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʾĪlmuquh Lord of the Ib-
their well-being and the well-being of their children and their property.
Restored full text of the inscription:
Biʿathtar, and his sons, of the lineage of ʿInānān Dhū-Dharaʾān set up the stele of
their goddess of protection with the favorable oracle and the aid of ʿAthtar Shāriqān and ʾĪlmuquh Lord of the Ib-
exes, and Shamsum i.e the goddess of protection, for their well-being and the well-being of their children and their property.
